title: Ten injured in Mirihana protest including several journalists
body_lines: Six people were admitted to the Colombo National Hospital after sustaining injuries following clashes between protestors and STF in Mirihana.
Another four patients were admitted to the Colombo South Teaching Hospital in Kalubowila.
Hospital sources said all the injured were male persons and several of them were journalists who were on the ground covering the event. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
